snippet: The nation joined Bahrain in withdrawing from the 2015 men’s World Handball Championships in Qatar in an apparent political boycott.
abstract: United Arab Emirates joins Bahrain in pulling out of the 2015 men’s World Handball Championships in Qatar in an apparent political boycott.
lead_paragraph: The nation joined Bahrain in withdrawing from the 2015 men’s World Handball Championships in Qatar in an apparent political boycott.

headline.main: United Arab Emirates Pulls Out of World Handball Championships
